about_the_game:
• Build, expand and customize your store! 🛠️
  • Appraise and buy second-hand items! 🔎
  • Buy cheaper than you could sell to profit! 🤑
  • Buy new displays, lighting and decor from your tablet! 🛋️
  • Pay your utility bills and rent! 📨
  • Increase your reputation to unlock new content. 🌟


  • Customers will come and go to your shop browsing your displayed items.🛍️
  • Every customer's shopping and haggling behaviours will be different. 🤠
  • Their emotions tend to swing a little bit on a daily basis to reflect real life and to eliminate monotony. 😡
  • Get to know your regular customers and strategize based on their personality. ♟️
  • Study your audience and buy the kind of items you can sell easily.💎



  • Evaluate and appraise the item when a customer wants to sell you something, otherwise you might get scabbed! 💸
  • When you have a price on your mind don't forget to add a margin for profit! 💰
  • We carefully designed the haggle interface for you to comprehend previous bids, current bids, a slider for making new bids and customer information all at once. 😎
  • Customers have patience. Strategize your way by studying your oppontents moves. 🎯
  • Sometimes not buying an item might be the best way to profit from it. 😎



  • Over 100 unique items waiting to be evaluated interactively. 🎻
  • Item evaluation consists of visual examination (labels, engravings, ornaments), interactive examination (latches, buttons, triggers) and power examination (powering up with batteries or electric outlet). 🏺
  • All items have condition, brand, model, rarity, overall market price information for you to decide the best price! 🧐
  • If you could not decide what is the best price, you can take photos from multiple angles and send it to an expert to get a better opinion. 🤓


  • In this game we provide you ways to attract more customers into your store and make them consider buying your displayed items. 🧲
  • Store attraction is calculated with what items you put in your storefront, closer to your store windows, neon signs and store signboard. This is what makes a regular person on the street to want to visit your store. 👥
  • Item attraction is calculated with synergy, which means the harmony between items in the same area. This is what makes a visitor, a customer. 🤝🏼
  • Carefully design your store to attract more people to your store, than to your displayed items to make the best deals and get rich! 🚀




  • Our release date is to be announced soon!
  • After that we are planning to release a Second-hand Clash Update. Featuring storage wars, auctions and 50+ new items.
  • After that we are planning to release a Pawn Empire Update. Featuring hiring employees, bank loans and more financial mechanics.
  • After that we are planning to release a Customer Update. Featuring new and more realistic customers with voice-lines and visible emotions.
  • More to be announced after the release!

name: Pawnbroker Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 9400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i9 9900k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 32 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
